medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain for several hours. Initially constant dull burning pain and left paramedian pain associated with nausea and bloating. Now sharp right lower quadrant pain. Denies vomiting, diarrhea, fever, or chills, with no correlation to food ingestion.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, depression, attention deficit disorder; laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and maternal grandfather had colorectal cancer. Denies other family history of cancers.
